response.overview: Released in 2003 on DVD (Region 0, PAL, full-screen 4:3 format), Hits and More is a compilation of Tony Bennett’s most celebrated performances, totaling approximately 52 minutes.  The video includes footage from various live concert performances, backed by Ralph Sharon (piano), Jon Buirr (bass), and Joe LaBarbera (drums).  This release fits within Bennett’s broader catalog, which includes other concert DVDs from the mid-2000s, such as Tony Bennett’s New York (2004) and An Evening with Tony Bennett (2005). It's a curated presentation of his jazz and pop standards tailored for home viewing, rather than a single-concert recording.
response.title: Tony Bennet - Hits and More
